item.description:
http://www.xapb.com/index.htm

FIELD HOURS OF OPERATION 
Mon - Wed: 3:00 pm - 8:00 pm
Thurs - Fri: 3:00 pm - 10:00 pm
Sat:10:00 am - 10:00 pm
Sun:10:00 am - 8:00 pm

 

Xtreme Action Sports LLC was established in April 2010. Co-Founder & CEO Jeff Sudman has been in the industry for nearly 10 years operating retail & online sectors of the paintball industry. After teaming up with Bob Prevatt (co-founder of Xtreme Action Paintball) they created a unique, one of kind, adrenaline pumping, more affordable playing experience.

"Xtreme Action Sports is committed to the best customer experience, safety, and pricing" (Sudman). 


Field: The field layout is over 13,000 Square feet with rooms, hallways, office & warehouse staged rooms, and always new projects in the works.

Our indoor facility allows you to never have to worry about the weather getting in the way of your plans! We can accommodate groups up to 40 players! We rent out high quality rental equipment at the lowest prices, so if you have your own gear or not we can serve you.
item.why: The two times I've played paintball I loved it and I recommend it to just about everyone I meet. I've never tried air-soft but this location has both and seems to cater to both new and experienced players.
item.name: Xtreme Action Sports: Indoor Paintball & Airsoft
